text: Gilbert East Jolliffe was MP for Petersfield in 1830-31.JOLLIFFE, Gilbert East (1802-1833), of Tilgate, nr. Crawley, Suss. Published in The History of Parliament: the House of Commons 1820-1832, ed. D.R. Fisher, 2009 Jolliffe was the eldest son of the Reverend William John Jolliffe and his wife Julia née Pytches.thePeerage.com He served in the army until his election victory.The Morning Post (London, England), Monday, April 01, 1822; Issue 15926. (2097 words). British Library Newspapers, Part II: 1800-1900. His younger brother William was the 1st Baron Hylton."DEATH OF LORD HYLTON" The Times, Saturday, 3 Jun 1876; pg. 8; Issue 28646; col D ==References== Category:1801 births Category:1833 deaths Category:19th Light Dragoons officers Category:Conservative Party (UK) MPs for English constituencies Category:UK MPs 1830–1831 Gilbert East
title: Gilbert East Jolliffe
